import MethodEndpoint from '@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint';
import ParamsDetails from '@theme/ParamsDetails';
import RequestSchema from '@theme/RequestSchema';
import StatusCodes from '@theme/StatusCodes';
import OperationTabs from '@theme/OperationTabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Heading from '@theme/Heading';

<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'listProjectElements'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/api/v1/projects/{username}/{slug}/elements'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

listProjectElements

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      schema: { type: 'string', example: 'johndoe', description: 'Username' },
      required: true,
      description: 'Username',
      name: 'username',
      in: 'path',
    },
    {
      schema: {
        type: 'string',
        example: 'my-novel',
        description: 'Project slug',
      },
      required: true,
      description: 'Project slug',
      name: 'slug',
      in: 'path',
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'List of project elements',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'array',
            items: {
              type: 'object',
              properties: {
                id: {
                  type: 'string',
                  example: 'elem-123',
                  description: 'Element ID',
                },
                name: {
                  type: 'string',
                  example: 'Chapter 1',
                  description: 'Element name',
                },
                type: {
                  type: 'string',
                  enum: [
                    'FOLDER',
                    'ITEM',
                    'CHARACTER',
                    'LOCATION',
                    'WB_ITEM',
                    'MAP',
                    'RELATIONSHIP',
                    'PHILOSOPHY',
                    'CULTURE',
                    'SPECIES',
                    'SYSTEMS',
                  ],
                  example: 'ITEM',
                  description: 'Element type',
                },
                parentId: {
                  type: 'string',
                  nullable: true,
                  example: null,
                  description: 'Parent element ID',
                },
                order: {
                  type: 'number',
                  example: 0,
                  description: 'Order in parent',
                },
                level: {
                  type: 'number',
                  example: 0,
                  description: 'Nesting level in tree hierarchy',
                },
                expandable: {
                  type: 'boolean',
                  example: false,
                  description: 'Whether element can be expanded (folders)',
                },
                version: {
                  type: 'number',
                  example: 1,
                  description: 'Version number for optimistic locking',
                },
                metadata: {
                  type: 'object',
                  additionalProperties: { type: 'string' },
                  description: 'Element metadata key-value pairs',
                },
                createdAt: {
                  type: 'string',
                  example: '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z',
                  description: 'Creation timestamp',
                },
                updatedAt: {
                  type: 'string',
                  example: '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z',
                  description: 'Last update timestamp',
                },
              },
              required: [
                'id',
                'name',
                'type',
                'parentId',
                'order',
                'level',
                'expandable',
                'version',
                'metadata',
              ],
              title: 'Element',
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '401': {
      description: 'Not authenticated',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: {
                type: 'string',
                example: 'An error occurred',
                description: 'Error message',
              },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ElementError',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '404': {
      description: 'Project not found',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: {
                type: 'string',
                example: 'An error occurred',
                description: 'Error message',
              },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ElementError',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
